thread.section_title: Alpha Flight Guru Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Alpha Flight Guru | alphaflightguru.com | 3 of 70
thread.title: Chris
thread.title_full: Alpha Flight Guru reviewed by Chris

author: Chris
title: Chris
text: In a world of online offers for discounted tickets, there are many claims of savings out there. However if you want service, these sites offer next to nothing. The folks at Alpha Flight Guru have helped me out twice with itineraries. They found heavily discounted fares on flights that exactly met my needs...and they were always available, knowledgeable and responsive. Amazing. Once ticketed, they continue to be available to assist you right through your trip. It is a "white glove" experience as they say. Definitely recommend giving them a try.
